PropertyValue.Value:
select t.task_name, case t.task_enable when '1' then '启用' when '0' then '不启用' else '未知' end as task_enable,
case t.exec_method when '1' then '任务轮询执行' when '2' then '每天执行一次' when '3' then '每周执行一次' when '4' then '每月执行一次' when '5' then '每年执行一次' else '未知' end as exec_method, case t.exec_status when '0' then '成功结束' when '1' then '已经开始' when '2' then '执行失败' else '未知' end as exec_status,
t.start_exec_date, t.start_exec_week, t.start_exec_time, t.end_exec_time, t.exec_interval, t.cost_time, t.last_exec_date, t.last_exec_time, t.total_exec_timer, t.total_fail_timer from task_manage t
